resources.string: Please select the calculation method for Salaat in your area. Muslim World League should work for most people.
Please take a moment to configure the Salaat times to your requirements.

By default Salaat times are configured using Muslim World League calculation method, Shafii Juristic for Asr time calculations and makes no adjustment for people living in higher latitudes.

 Other calculation methods include: Karachi, ISNA, Makkah, Egypt, Tehran, Jafri

 You can choose to use the default settings (don't worry you can change them later), or configure the Salaat times to your requirements below.
